Title: NGT-appointed panel biased, says Art of Living
Content: : “The National Green Tribunal-appointed committee is biased, unscientific and lacks credibility. All facts point to male fide intentions to malign The Art of Living,” is how team Sri Sri Ravi Shankar
Author: Bindu Shajan Perappadan
